name: service-creator
description: A simple abstraction to create "services", plain objects that can be used to perform fetch calls in a convention over configuration fashion.
author: royriojas

scripts.do-changelog: bun run changelog && git add ./changelog.md && git commit -m 'DOC: Generate changelog' --no-verify
scripts.post-v: bun run do-changelog && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.bump-major: bun run pre-v && npm version major -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-minor: bun run pre-v && npm version minor -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: bun run pre-v && npm version patch -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
scripts.bump-prerelease: bun run pre-v && npm version prerelease -m 'BLD: Release v%s' && npm run post-v
